04-report-template-oyo

Set up

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

Import your files

#copy from analysis
power_cleaned_list <- list.files(
  "data-processed-power",
  full.names = T
)

Combine all your files

#copy from analysis
all_outages <- map(
  power_cleaned_list,
  read_csv,
  col_type = cols(fips = col_character())
) |>
  list_rbind() |>
  clean_names()

all_outages

States: (check your work)

#outages <- all_outages |>

Do some analysis for your state

  • What is the most common cause of power outages?
  • What cause leads to the longest power outages?

tip: use event_category instead of event_type
